mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO dataset_classification (dataset_id, name, is_required, input_type,attribute, created_by, updated_by) VALUES
(#{item.datasetId},#{item.name},#{item.isRequired},#{item.inputType}, #{item.attribute,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{item.createdBy},#{item.updatedBy})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE is_required=VALUES(is_required), input_type=VALUES(input_type), attribute=VALUES(attribute), updated_by=VALUES(updated_by)
